message: Uthman Ibrahim Galadima Ana maganar fulanin daji makiyaya yasa kan shi ciki saboda rashin fahimta

parent.message:
'Yan uwammu suka ja masu. Nan gaba kadan duk wani bafillatanin daji bakin jini zai yi. Jahilan fulani sun jaza mana bakin jini da bakin ciki.

Allah Ya shirye mu baki daya. Aamin.

Ai kuskuren da Fulani suka shine da suka dauki abokan zamansu na tsawon lokaci akan masoyansu me,alhali kuwa sune makiyansu na farko kuma sune makiyansu na gaske.
ALLAH ya tsare mu da munafikin abokin zama

parent.message: Wannan rashin adalcine, fulanin dasuka dau makami yanzuma dayawansu irin abinda yafaru dasu kenan suka dau makami, idan aka tashi ba'a bambamce Mai laifi sai amusu kudin goro, hakan yasa dayawa daga cikinsu Zama Yan ta'addah allah yasauwaqe

parent.message:
Yanxu kuma waɗan nan fulani ina zasu saka kansu 52 years suna zaune amma lokaci daya azo atashesu ya xasu kenan?

Sojojin daya kamata su shiga cikin jeji su kamo 'yan ta'adda amma sun kasa saboda zalinchi kuma sai suzo su rushe gidajen mutane haka kawai 

Sukuma 'yan ta'adda suna chan su ɓarnarsu yadda sukaga dama bawanda ya isa ya hana su 

Yanxu irin wannan ce takesa wasa suke shiga irin waɗannan kungiyoyi na 'yan ta'adda domin a tashesu basu da inda zasu koma babu abunda sukayi

message:
Ai bahaushe in zakaka rataye uwar shi zai miqa ma igiya.
Mu munsan sha-sha-shu ne ku.
Lokacin da sojoji sukai yi muku ta'addanci a zaria aka kashe mutum fiye da dubu. 
Sai kuka ce dai-dai ne ai alhakin zagin sahabbai ne.
Yarabawa sun muku kisa a can kudu sun kona duk wata kaddara mallakar bahaushe mai ban haushi

message: Ameen

parent.message:
Ya Allah kayi mana sauki domin Kananan Yara da suke cikinmu.
Ya Allah kayi mana sauki domin Tsofaffi Maza da mata da suke cikinmu.
Ya Allah Kayi mana sauki domin marasu lfy Maza da Mata, Manya da kanana dake cikinmu.
Ya Allah kayi mana sauki domin Dabbobi da Kwari da suke Gari da Dazuzzuka.
Ya Allah kayi mana sauki karka kamamu da laifin da wasu wawaye suke aikata Laifuffuka iri daban daban daga cikinmu.
Ya Allah agareka muke kuma agareka muke neman Taimako.

parent.message: Wannan ba adalci bane, a matsayinsu na jami'an tsaro duk inda sukaga Mara gaskiya ai ya kamata su gane  su, ammah ace sama da shekara 52 mutane na zaune a wuri  Ku tashe su, "this is injustice'" kar  kumanta tafa suma citizens ne yan Nigeria ne kamar  kowa, yau wayasan INA zasuje? wa zasuje su hadu dasu? Me zasu kohma yi yanzu? Duk ba Wanda yasani inba Allah ba, sunsan  Inda yan ta addan nan suke  me yasa baza sujeba, ana aiki da yawa a kasa  domin anfanan yan kasann Nigeria ammah koh primary health care ba,a taba yinma ba fullatani ba kusa dshi sai  ya shigo cikin gari sannan zai samu kula shin wai su ba yan kasa bane? Aima juna  adalci Don Allah..

Kiwo da numa dashi suka dogara yanzu babu muhallin,al Umma kukasance masu adalci bayanda za'ayi laifin wasu ya shafi wasu.

message: Ka kasance mai yin adalci koda akan makiyin Kane,nasan mutane zasuyi min adalci acikin rubutun danayi babu gurinda na goyi bayan yan ta'adda kaima kaga hakan,ni ina gaba da duk wani dan ta'adda da ayyukansu,ba'a arewa ba ko a kudu ne,ba'a nigeria a duk duniya ma,dan haka mu duk yanda adalci yake to agurin muke.

message: Sorry malam Ibrahim Dabo da sauran fulani kuke cewa kawai Amma bakwa ambatar Mundubawa

parent.message: Yakamata Masu bada tarihin Kano kudaina danne gidan Fulanin Mundubawa dan kufarantawa wasu rai. Kusan dai tutar jahadi tana hannun Jagoran Fulanin Mundubawa wato Sarkin Kano Suleman Wanda yafito daga wannan zuriya. Amma Malam Ibrahim Dabo da sauran gidajen fulani, Yakamata ku gyara

message: To yanzu dai bansani ba saboda yadda siyasa ta lalata harkar fada har takaj wasu hakimai ma sun ajje.  Amma akwai zuri'ar Sarkin  Kano Suleman wadanda akayi a baya kuma Ni nafito daga wannan zuri'ar . Acikin kakanin mu akwai Dan Amar Suleman hakimin Gabasawa daga 1908-1925 akwai Dan Amar Habu daga 1925-1946. Akwai wasu dayawa kafin wadannan Kamar Mai Unguwar Mundubawa Toro, Maajin watari Abduwa, Badde kerarra Ummaru agaskiya suna dayawa domin Ni inadasu acikin arubuche dayawa. Amma Kuna danne mu. Akwai ma har yazuwa kan Tsohon Sarki Sunusi Lamido Sunusi Amma bansani ba yanxu. Zan binciki kuma zan gayamaka kaje katambaya za'a cemaka hakane. Kudunga cewa Sarkin Kano Suleman daga Fulanin Mundubawa Sannan kuce Malam Ibrahim Dabo daga Fulanin Sullubawa. Kuma kamanta cewa ko lokacin da Sarkin Kano yayi sarautar Kano akwai kaninsa dayayiwa sarauta wato Galadiman Kano Sani dama wasu daga cikin yayansa. Wallahi Dan yanzu Ina wannan rubutun wajen 12:30am Dana lisdafo maka hakiman Mundubawa har zuwa kan wanna zamanin na Sarki Aminu Ado Bayaro.

parent.message: Yakamata Masu bada tarihin Kano kudaina danne gidan Fulanin Mundubawa dan kufarantawa wasu rai. Kusan dai tutar jahadi tana hannun Jagoran Fulanin Mundubawa wato Sarkin Kano Suleman Wanda yafito daga wannan zuriya. Amma Malam Ibrahim Dabo da sauran gidajen fulani, Yakamata ku gyara

message: Wallahi munyi hakimchi dayawa. Amma zan lisdafo maka Yaya da Jikokin Sarkin Kano Suleman har xuwa yanzu. Nagode sai da safe

parent.message: Yakamata Masu bada tarihin Kano kudaina danne gidan Fulanin Mundubawa dan kufarantawa wasu rai. Kusan dai tutar jahadi tana hannun Jagoran Fulanin Mundubawa wato Sarkin Kano Suleman Wanda yafito daga wannan zuriya. Amma Malam Ibrahim Dabo da sauran gidajen fulani, Yakamata ku gyara

message: Na yarda cewa Sarkin Kano Suleman Yana yaro but Amma kada kamanta tun Sarkin Kano Alwali Yana sarautar Kano anbashi labarin cewa akwai wani yaro Dan makaranta Wanda zai wuce ta kofar kudu kuma shi kadai ne mutum nafarko da idan kafito kasa kujerar ka a kofar kudu shi zaka Fara gani haka kuwa akayi Sarki Suleman yawuce yatafi makaranta sai da Sarkin Kano Alwali yazauna har say uku but Amma Sarki Suleman yake wucewa da sassafe zuwa makaranta. Sarkin  Kano Alwali Ana kasheshi Sarkin Kano Suleman yazama Sarki na farko a Daular Fulani. Yana hawa yadakko kaninsa uwa daya Uba daya yanadashi Galadiman Kano Sani wato Galadiman nafarko a Daular Fulani. To da Dan wannan gajeren tarihin zakaga cewa Sarki Suleman bashi kadai bane yayi Sarki yagama batare da wani Dan uwa ba kuma akwai jikokinsa irin su Dan Amar Suleman da Dan Amar Habu da Barde kerarra Umaru Kai har da wasu daga cikin yayansa nacikinsa, kuma shi mulki indai kayi ko na wata goma ne dole a Fadi sunanka acikin tarihi misali Sarkin Kano Inuwa wata takwas  yayi ga marigayi Sarki Sunusi na daya nan ko shekarar goma bayiba yasauka to kaga maganar dadewa ba hujja bace shi Sarki Suleman yakai kusan Gom Sha biyu yana sarauta a Kano, kuma gashi Mahaifinsa Limamine a Kano wato Liman Abu Abahama kaga yafito daga gidan ilimi kuma Shima yayi ilimi tun Yana yaro. Kada kamanta Shehu Usman bin fodio Yana Raye yazama Sarki kaga da jahiline bazai yarda yazama Sarki ba kuma bayani yazama Sarki shi yake limanci kaga Sarkin ku limaminku kuma dashi aka karbi tuta tunda shi Wanda akabawa tuta yarasu Mal Danzabuwa tun kan azo Kano yarasu. Kuma Nagayamaka Ni kakananinmu su sukayi sarautar Dan Amar Din Kano hakimin Gabasawa daya daga 1908 zuwa 1925 daya daga 1925 zuwa 1946 dukkansu kuma Fulanin Mundubawa ne. Ka yarda damaganata cewa Ana Fara lissafine daga Mal Ibrahim Dabo ne kawai dan a farantawa wasu rai kuma suji tarihin yafi dadi batare da ansawo musu wani daga wata zuri'ar ba. Amma wallahi nasan kaima kaga Ana lissafawane ba Sarkin Kano Suleman shiyasa kabada tarihin a hakan. Ma'ana Banga laifinka ba wallahi.

parent.message: Yakamata Masu bada tarihin Kano kudaina danne gidan Fulanin Mundubawa dan kufarantawa wasu rai. Kusan dai tutar jahadi tana hannun Jagoran Fulanin Mundubawa wato Sarkin Kano Suleman Wanda yafito daga wannan zuriya. Amma Malam Ibrahim Dabo da sauran gidajen fulani, Yakamata ku gyara

message: Sulaimanu malami ne sosai dabo kuma almajirinsa sabida haka shine yagaji dabo ana alakanta Kano da dabo saboda shine yafi Shahara Akan mulki Akan sulaimanu  kuma shine yakawo hierarchy cikin sarautar Kano daga kansa har sarki nayanxu aminu ado duk xuriyar dabo ne.

parent.message:
Don Allah tambayata anan itace:
  Minene alakar dake
Tsakanin sarkin Kano Mal. Sulaimanu da Mal. Ibrahim dabo?
   Domin naga Ko Gidan sarautar kano a halin yanzu ana alakantashi ne da Gidan dabo. Alhali Mal. Sulaimanu ya karbo tutar jihadi daga Dan fodio zuwa Kano kuma shine sarki na farko a jerin sarakunan fulani.
Nagode

message:
Dalilin shine alokacin sarkin kano Ibrahim dabo ya yaki manyan garuruwa har guda biyar wadanda dukanninsu sarakuna wadanda suka hada da
1 sarkin rano na wancen lokacin
2 sarkin Dambatta na wancen lokacin
3 sarkin karaye na wancen lokacin
4 Sarkin Dutse na wancen lokacin
5 sarkin Gaya na wancen lokacin 
Duk suka dawo karkashinshi ahalin yanzu  kuma
Dutse tanada Sarkin ta a jihar jigawa
Rano tanada sarkin ta a jihar kano
Karaye tanada sarkin ta a jihar kano
Gaya tanada sarkin ta jihar kano
Dambatta Kuma shiru babu labarin sarautarta

parent.message:
Don Allah tambayata anan itace:
  Minene alakar dake
Tsakanin sarkin Kano Mal. Sulaimanu da Mal. Ibrahim dabo?
   Domin naga Ko Gidan sarautar kano a halin yanzu ana alakantashi ne da Gidan dabo. Alhali Mal. Sulaimanu ya karbo tutar jihadi daga Dan fodio zuwa Kano kuma shine sarki na farko a jerin sarakunan fulani.
Nagode

message:
So long as this entity is not divided, this octopus will remain large and achieve nothing.
The Fulani milker's will remain primitive forever becos they feel that they are born to rule while others will work and they enjoy.. They look at the Buckingham Palace in British Europe as an equivalent.. True Britain promised them this for their obedience to them.
Don't work, we will protect you in our colony called Nigga Area.

parent.message: God bless you I have never seen an Igboman so honest about Nigeria like you. The so called Nigeria  is a Nation of many Nations, with different Cultures, Orientation, Religion and Believes. I am a Proud Yoruba Woman and I believed to be a Yoruba first before a Nigerian. I felt insulted at times to be called a Nigerian. Regional government is the best and honest way to develop and maximize our God given resources and potentials That country Nigeria.

message: Your right but iroinsi also contributed in what they partake in their doings.

parent.message:
Who removed the regional government first of all? For me the person who changed the system of government was the course of all the predicaments that Nigerians is facing today, who was the person ? Is an igbo man general aguiyi ironsi. My brother if you was the fulanis you will do the same, zik was the first problem he cried to the northern  caliphate to accept independent alongside with the south, awolowo refused and warned him not to do that  but he ran to them at the back of his brother awolowo to sign the deal with the north, awolowo was not happy about that till death,  finally what happened, Mr awo told him that this people are not our friends or brothers, we can't be in one family with them, let us ask for our own independent and freedom  hence they said that they are not yet ready to be free from the UK supremacy, they said their people are not educated enough like the people of the south to work together in an independent country, they said they need more time to educate themselves in all fields,  let us use this opportunity to have our own nation if not it will be hell to southerners to be together with this people in one country, zik said he wanted a big country like united states.
 now see what his selfishness is doing to his people and Nigeria at large. 
 they northerners agreed after having meetings with the UK officials and the queen of England also with the French government with out zik and awolowo, immediately after the meeting all  the leaders was invited to  London, after the meeting the first thing they do is referemdoum to remove the English speaking southern camaroon from Nigeria and added some part of English speaking  northern camaroon to Nigeria in 1959 before general election that was campaigning with (ncnc) Nigerian camaroon national congress, those who was added from the northern camaroon voted while zik lost his members to camaroon new country to be, they didn't vote in Nigeria anymore because they are no longer part of eastern province months before the prime minister election, that was the first mistake zik made he lost the election in 1959, tafawa belewa won the election became the first prime minister the UK handed over power to him while zik became the first president with no power. My dear no remedy to this illness on till you separate the oil from the water, the north is like oil while the south is like the water, they aren't the same. Stop blaming the fulanis they are using the platform that was available to  them created by the igbos, the yourobas understood it long ago they found a way to play the game with them, igbos who was the first are now the last in Nigerian politics, igbo leaders are now boiboi to the caliphates and the rest of the other politicians from southwest.

parent.message: We're all tears to see all these fulani slaves severing all the things that hold us together as Igbo race. My brother, it's pathetic. As you said, why can't these billionaires build industries to empower youths by securing jobs, equipping hospitals and schools to take care of health and effective education respectively? Twelve million naira will build a cottage industries capable of giving jobs to all youths in ukpo. It can build standard hospital in ukpo to treat ailments and so on. If all the billionaires in Igboland can do these in their respective areas , people will be happy. No they can't do it. It's to give us sachets of rice every festivity and lure us to serve the fulani oligarchs.
